channel.title: IRC Issues
channel.description:
For the past... um week or two, i have tried many ways to access the irc for moparisthebest. But everytime i try either with the webclient or mIRC it never works and i get a connection loss or a system timeout or even a software abort. I am looking for serious help please. If anyone can give me a step by step i would be very gratefull as i have wanted to join for a long time.
Please don't just say: Change firewall settings, as i have sorta tried it.
Please tell me in depth what to do.
Much appreciated.

item.title: IRC Issues
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I’ve never run Windows firewall so I don’t know if that would stop it, but do you have some other firewall running? I know ZoneAlarm has a specific option that blocks irc connections.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Issues
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Yes… i have everything correct… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Issues
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

are you sure the server is correct (case sensitive)

irc.moparisthebest.com

Im on now, so I dont know whats wrong!

Read full topic
